Bump admin guide

This article presents the basic configuration information of bump. Bump is a java/groovy based web application. The web framework which bump use is grails 3.2.4. It connects a postgresql server (9.5).

Server information

server name : CCLinBUMPD01

server IP : 10.70.3.28

server url : bump.bioaster.org

This servers runs apache 2.4.6 as front end, and tomcat 7.0.69 as backend. The front end and back end is linked with a reverse ajp proxy.

The conf can be find at /etc/httpd/conf.d/bump.conf

The war file can be find at /usr/share/tomcat/webapps/portal.war

The log can be found at /var/log/bump/

The xacml request template file can be found at /usr/share/bump/template

The keystore for access soap web service at acc-wso.bioaster.org can be found at /usr/share/bump/wso_certs
